pages.home_tv:
Virtua

Collecting. Reinvented.

Welcome to the world's first immersive digital collectible platform! Choose amazing digital merch from some of the biggest names in the entertainment industry, or check out our limited edition vFlect collectibles. Share, Showcase, Trade and more in the world of Virtua!
pages.home_legendary:
Pacific Rim: Uprising

By Order Of The PPDC â Prepare To Bridge.

Check out the new Pacific Rim: Uprising 2D, 2DA and 3D collectibles. Find and collect your favourite Jaegers from the Sci-Fi blockbuster, but beware, systems are also detecting an increase in Kaiju movement, so keep a lookout!
pages.home_art_gallery:
Art Gallery

A Digital Renaissance

The Terra Virtua Digital Art Gallery brings a whole new dimension of stunning visual works by top artists - browse still and animated digital works created especially for the Terra Virtua Connoisseur Collection in our 3D Virtual Gallery.
Terra Virtua is changing the face of digital artwork - come and experience the renaissance!

See Digital Art Like You've Never Seen Before
pages.home_pc_app_page:
BRING YOUR COLLECTIBLES TO LIFE IN THE FANCAVE & VIRTUA DOME!

Download the Virtua PC App and display all your 3D collectibles in the customisable 3D environments. Invite friends over to see your amazing, animated collection. Try it now!
pages.home_mobile_app_page:
THE ULTIMATE SELFIE WITH OUR AR APP

Install the Virtua Android App, which allows you to browse your collection and display your 3D characters in your real-life environment using AR technology. Snap a photo or shoot a video posing with your collectible!
pages.home_paramount_page:
The Top Gun Collection

Feel the need... the need for speed.

Time for an inverted dive into the world of collecting. Experience Top Gun digital collectibles, complete with 2D and 2D Animated posters, along with 3D models of the helmets of the best pilots in the Top Gun Program. The skies call upon you once more, so start collecting.
pages.home_auction_page:
Auctions

Going once, going twice, gone!

Take part in auctions across Terra Virtua or even set up your own! The auctions page is your path to the world of digital auctioning, so feel free to take part and experience the excitement of a real-time auction.

news.description: The wait is over, Cardano Cribs are here! Claim your starter crib on Cardano Island and experience your first home in Virtua Metaverse! Head over to "https://claim.virtua.com" to grab your Crib!

Step into Virtua Island's first Land Sale and enter the Monster Zone! Buy land on Monster Zone, or a condo in Empyrean Tower and explore the monstrous territory filled with mysterious lore! Condo Purchase is available on both Android and iOS Virtua apps!
news.short_description: Discover Virtua Prime and enter the Monster Zone, the first metaverse experience on Virtua Island!

news.description: A league of all-star hockey bots has arrived to Terra Virtua to show of their impeccable skills. Decked in kits and ready to skate and shoot, the Hockey Bots are now available on Virtua Marketplace!
news.short_description: A league of all-star hockey bots has arrived, decked in kits and ready to skate and shoot, the Hockey Bots are now available on the Virtua Marketplace!

news.description: Virtua and Hero Indian Super League bring you all new assets of your favourite teams and players, packed into amazing Team Posters and a massive range of iconic moments from the latest season - Available Now!
news.short_description: Virtua and Hero Indian Super League bring you all new assets of your favourite teams and players - Available Now!

news.description: A team of cyberpunk vFlects clad in steel and brightly coloured mohawks have been spotted lurking in Virtua, so be on the look out! Available in a number of different variants, these Bots are armed, dangerous and definitely up to no good!

news.description: Specially designed vehicles built by Apex like the automated drone and HEAV, along with a number of impeccably crafted posters consisting of your favourite titans including Kong, Godzilla and Mechagodzilla are now available on the Virtua Marketplace!
news.short_description: Monsterverse Mania - Specially designed vehicles built by Apex, along with a number of impeccably crafted posters consisting of your favourite titans are now available on the Virtua Marketplace!

Virtua X Polygon - Virtua is now on the Polygon Chain, an environmentally friendly alternative, providing its users a more secure network to conduct their transactions and to trade with an ease of mind.

news.description: Bigger is better! Experience the Virtua Dome, a colossal space for larger assets like giant creatures and spaceships, available for download from Virtua. Experience it now in stunning 3D on your Windows PC!

Virtua has launched it's updated website with new types of NFTs: Digital Artwork. Users will be able to view unique artwork by artists across the globe in a shimmering hall of white and black marble - The Art Gallery.
vFlects - The Back Story: Experience the twist of ideas and years of work that blended together to form Virtua's very own vFlects, all down to the last gear!
From Stamp-Collecting to Digital Collectibles: Virtua opens up Virtual Treasures to the Mainstream.
Donât forget to download your free, customizable Fancave & Virtua Dome to show off your prized collectibles.
